highlights: Led the digital knowledge hub roadmap aligning AI services, repository modernization, and governance standards.
Implemented enterprise-wide metadata governance using MARC21, RDA, and authority control workflows.
Designed a knowledge analytics dashboard to track research impact and content reuse across faculties.
Migrated legacy repositories to DSpace with preservation workflows and OAI-PMH interoperability.
Launched digitization initiatives covering rare collections and institutional archives.
Built staff capability programs in digital preservation, cataloging automation, and user experience.
Developed KM strategy linking research outputs to institutional KPIs and stakeholder reporting.
Standardized metadata schemas and implemented controlled vocabularies for multidisciplinary content.
Delivered 30+ workshops on information literacy, data stewardship, and repository best practices.
